name: C.H.A.O.S.
description:
A humorous, weird, wacky game with some crazy physics.

Play as a special forces officer who must delay or destroy a group of out of control autonomous cars. 

Keep the cars back for a minute and thirty seconds, and your allies will shut down the cars.

Use standard FPS controls (WASD to walk, Space to jump, Mouse to look) and the left mouse button to shoot. 

With the right mouse button, you zoom into scope mode, where time slows down. 

Try to destroy or delay the cars from reaching the city by shooting or running into them. 

This is our first game jam, so hope you enjoy!
